meanings.definition: Brought or placed together in one place.
meanings.sent1: She collected all her toys in a box.
meanings.sent2: The teacher collected the homework from the students.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels collected acorns for their winter stash.
meanings.sent4: The detective collected evidence to solve the case.
meanings.sent5: He collected shells on the beach to make a necklace.

meanings.sent1: She remained collected during the emergency.
meanings.sent2: The speaker was collected while addressing the crowd.
meanings.sent3: Even in chaos, he stayed collected and focused.
meanings.sent4: Her collected demeanor helped soothe the situation.
meanings.sent5: The collected cat purred softly in her lap.

meanings.sent1: He made sure the bill was collected before leaving.
meanings.sent2: The customer was collected and could enjoy the meal.
meanings.sent3: The collected invoice brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent4: She felt relieved knowing the debt was collected.
meanings.sent5: The collected receipt was proof of payment.
